Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the unique features it offers, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special price of $9,500. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate, tailored to enhance your experience. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
